title: Companion Approval Guide
content: ll Abdirak you're curious and agree to be tortured (the follower of Loviatar in the goblin camp). Agree to open the gate for goblin raiders. Open the Gate for goblin raiders. Join Minthara for the Grove raid ( It's possible without actual opening the Gates). Fight the fake god Boooal in The Festering Cove. Let the Koa-Toes bow to you as the Boooal's chosen. Ask for "Compensation for Effort" in dialogue with Bark Root (the guy who was tied to the windmill). Attack the Druid Apprentice Nettie. Agr
